blog.name: spamdog
blog.title: A kutya csak ugat
blog.description:
Erről meg azt regélik, hogy barátul
Tartá az ember, ingyen, munka nélkül,
S fel bírta fogni, hű elismeréssel
Lesvén, az ember gondolatait.
Mi több, mondják, hogy elsajátitá
Bűnét is, a tulajdonnak fogalmát,
S mint őr od'adta érte életét.

blog.name: boundingintocomics

blog.description: Your Best Source for News, Reviews, and Opinion when it comes to Comics!

summary: I Love Captain Marvel, But Lately We've Been on the Rocks
title: I Love Captain Marvel, But Lately We've Been on the Rocks
body:
I Love Captain Marvel, But Lately We’ve Been on the Rocks

I love Captain Marvel. Carol Danvers is one of the best characters to come out of The House of Ideas. The first Carol Danvers story I bought was [easyazon_link identifier=”B00ZNS24P8″ locale=”US” tag=”boundingintocomics-20″]Ms. Marvel #1[/easyazon_link] in 1977 and I’ve stuck with her ever since. I’ve followed her adventures through The X-Men, The Avengers, and hundreds of guest appearances.…

View On WordPress

blog.name: ms-carol-danvers
blog.title: Carol Danvers.
blog.description: Everything Captain Marvel + MCU in the lead-up to her film.

summary: Captain Marvel - After Thanos comes Secret Invasion?
title: Captain Marvel - After Thanos comes Secret Invasion?
body:
Captain Marvel – After Thanos comes Secret Invasion?

Captain Marvel – After Thanos comes Secret Invasion

Captain Marvel

It seems from what we know that Captain Marvel will have her powers right from the beginning of the film. It seems Marvel are giving us a ready made hero just as they did with Black Panther; no origins story.

It seems that Disney has rightfully become  so confident in the success of the MCU that they don’t feel the need to give us…

View On WordPress
